capabilities.name: add_nodes
capabilities.description: Add multiple new nodes in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: update_nodes
capabilities.description: Update existing nodes in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: add_edges
capabilities.description: Add multiple new edges between nodes in the knowledge graph. Edges should be in active voice

capabilities.name: update_edges
capabilities.description: Update existing edges in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_nodes
capabilities.description: Delete multiple nodes and their associated edges from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_edges
capabilities.description: Delete multiple edges from the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: read_graph
capabilities.description: Read the entire knowledge graph

capabilities.name: search_nodes
capabilities.description: Search for nodes in the knowledge graph based on a query

capabilities.name: open_nodes
capabilities.description: Open specific nodes in the knowledge graph by their names

capabilities.name: add_metadata
capabilities.description: Add new metadata to existing nodes in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_metadata
capabilities.description: Delete specific metadata from nodes in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: add_artifact
capabilities.description: Add a new artifact or unique item to the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: update_artifact
capabilities.description: Update an existing artifact in the knowledge graph

capabilities.name: delete_artifact
capabilities.description:
Delete
            an existing
            artifact
            from
            the
            knowledge
            graph
